name: The Skirmish 2
description:
Fight the Imperium and become a pirate captain!

Command a group of pirates in a strange brew of strategy, tactics and shooting in space. Embark on Captain Gorgutz' campaign, test your skills on specific scenarios or create your own epic skirmish. Choose from an arsenal of 10 battleships and master them all!

This is a hugely expanded version of a game originally made for Mini Jam 28.
The old version is available here on Itch.io.

Current version is 0.37, updated 28.11.19.

MUSIC by Halindir - Vaniardur LX
